com.southamptoncodedojo.minesweeper

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.southamptoncodedojo.minesweeper.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains a game where one or more AIs play Minesweeper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      PlayerPlayingGame[] playersPlayingGame 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Game(int size, int numberOfMines, Player[] players)
      Create a new game
      Game(Map map, Player[] players)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean gameIsOver() 
      void nextRound()
      Get players to make a round of turns at a time (Every still active player will take a turn) This will not do anything if the game is over, and it will skip any players who have already lost this game.
      void nextTurn()
      The player who's turn it is will take their turn, and the effects will be applied to the board This will not do anything if the game is over, and it will skip any players who have already lost this game.
      void setup()
      Set up the game.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(int size,
    int numberOfMines,
    Player[] players)
        Create a new game
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the map
        numberOfMines - The number of mines on the map
        players - The Players to play

      • Game

        public Game(Map map,
    Player[] players)
        Create a new game, on a pre-created map
        Parameters:
        map - The map to be used
        players - The Players to play

    • Method Detail

      • nextTurn

        public void nextTurn()
        The player who's turn it is will take their turn, and the effects will be applied to the board This will not do anything if the game is over, and it will skip any players who have already lost this game.

      • nextRound

        public void nextRound()
        Get players to make a round of turns at a time (Every still active player will take a turn) This will not do anything if the game is over, and it will skip any players who have already lost this game.

      • setup

        public void setup()
        Set up the game. Generate the map, and get every player to take their first turn. THIS MUST BE CALLED BEFORE ANYTHING ELSE

      • gameIsOver

        public boolean gameIsOver()
        Returns:
        Has every player either won or lost the map?
